sourcesContent:
import { Button, Form, Segment,Grid, Header, Message } from 'semantic-ui-react';

/*notes for later
add onSubmit functionality to button
if trainer doesnt have a username a prompt will say to contact admin to create an account    
take to page for trainers to input their information about the dog's training, photos, etc
add Validation for inputs
*/
export default () => (
<Grid centered >
    <Grid.Column>
        <Header as="h2" textAlign="center">
            Login
        </Header>
        <Segment style={{marginLeft: '5% ', width: '90%'}}>
            <Form size="large">
                <Form.Input
                    fluid
                    icon="user"
                    iconPosition="left"
                    placeholder="Email address"
                />
                <Form.Input
                    fluid
                    icon="lock"
                    iconPosition="left"
                    placeholder="Password"
                    type="password"
                />
                <Button type='submit' size="large">Log In</Button>
            </Form>
        </Segment>
        <Message>
            Not registered yet? Contact your admin at email@example.com to create your credentials.
        </Message>
    </Grid.Column>
</Grid>
);
